name: Pentago
description:
Welcome to Pentago, a game of skill!

Can you get 5 in a row before the other player? Do you have what it takes to beat your opponent?

The classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe, but with a twist! Select pieces, rotate boards; Pentago brings a new level of excitement!

- Play against someone near or far!
- Three fresh themes to choose from!

Note: To play multiplayer across two devices, both players must be signed into iCloud.
